documents.document: @SenatorCollins thank you for standing up today.

@SenFranken yes. Hold the line!
@ananavarro absolutely. Kids are off limits. He seems like a good kid too.
@MaxineWaters just saw you with Katy Tur. Keep preaching the truth!

@Bakari_Sellers and who will hold him accountable?
@JoyAnnReid but won't he be able to shut this down? Who will step up?
@HallieJackson hold the line.
@KatyTurNBC counting on you and others to keep reporting. A free press is our last hope. N

@deray it is an insane argument.

@89SteveSmith welcome home man. We have missed you
